Title: Creates a bill of rights for people with developmental disabilities who reside in residences certified or approved by the office for people with developmental disabilities
Summary: Creates a bill of rights for people with developmental disabilities who reside in residences certified or approved by the office for people with developmental disabilities.
LawCode: Add ยง13.04, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to creating a bill of rights for individuals with developmental disabilities who reside in residences certified or approved by the office for people with developmental disabilities
